name: Five Nights at Luigi Games: ☆COLLECTION☆
description:
The Mac and Linux builds of FNaLG: Collection has not been tested yet. There may be many bugs.

The Five Nights at Luigi Games: Collection is a collection of the first 5 FNaF Fan Games I have made, originally called Five Nights at Luigi Madness' then changed to Five Nights at Luigi Games because the acronym for Five Nights at Luigi Madness', FNaLM, was taken by Five Nights at Luigi's Mansion.

https://loooogi.itch.io/  - Lead Dev, Main Artist & Modeler

https://comatoasterstrudel.itch.io/ - Creator of ComaToast

https://gamejolt.com/@Atanasthephantom - Artist of Atanas
